text: Myristica globosa is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is found in Papua New Guinea the Solomon Islands and Australia. Two subspecies are recognised: *M. globosa Warb. subsp. globosa' *M. globosa subsp. muelleri (Warb.) W.J.de Wilde \- Queensland nutmeg ==References== globosa Category:Near threatened plants Category:Flora of Australia Category:Flora of Papua New Guinea Category:Flora of the Solomon Islands (archipelago) Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Myristica globosa
